title: Hurtworld v0.3.5.3 x64 Kortal
description:
Game: HurtWorld v0.3.5.3 x64
crack: RVTFIX, Kortal
files: Kortal

Please use a fake steam account (create a new account here: https://store.steampowered.com/join/?)

Run HurtworldClient.exe

In the game main menu, press F1 to open console and use the command to connect to a server: 
connect hurtworld24.pl
connect 188.117.136.129:12871

Server fanpage:

Please note you can only connect to cracked (non steam) servers.
IF you want to change the language, you have to edit file "revolt.ini".

If you have steam auth ticket error, try with another steam account.
VAC Banned accounts can't join server.

Have fun !
